### promoteAllocaUserToVector() {#aff60d107b0bf41de42918c5bf046d8c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; promoteAllocaUserToVector (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Inst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42; VectorTy, unsigned VecStoreSize, unsigned ElementSize, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferinst">MemTransferInst</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/structs/memtransferinfo">MemTransferInfo</a> &gt; &amp; TransferInfo, std::map&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/getelementptrinst">GetElementPtrInst</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; GEPVectorIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; CurVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DeferredLoads)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Promotes a single user of the alloca to a vector form.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Inst"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> to be promoted.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="DL"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> Data Layout.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="VectorTy">Vectorized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="VecStoreSize">Size of <code>VectorTy</code> in bytes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="ElementSize">Size of <code>VectorTy</code> element type in bytes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="TransferInfo"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferinst">MemTransferInst</a> info map.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="GEPVectorIdx">GEP -&gt; VectorIdx cache.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="CurVal">Current value of the vector (e.g. last stored value)</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[out] DeferredLoads"><code>Inst</code> is added to this vector if it can&#39;t be promoted now. This happens when promoting requires <code>CurVal</code>, but <code>CurVal</code> is nullptr.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the stored value if <code>Inst</code> would have written to the alloca, or nullptr otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="#l00448">448</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpupromotealloca-cpp">AMDGPUPromoteAlloca.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Eliminates allocas by either converting them into vectors or by migrating</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them to local address space.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Two passes are exposed by this file:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    - &quot;promote-alloca-to-vector&quot;, which runs early in the pipeline and only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      promotes to vector. Promotion to vector is almost always profitable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      except when the alloca is too big and the promotion would result in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      very high register pressure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    - &quot;promote-alloca&quot;, which does both promotion to vector and LDS and runs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      much later in the pipeline. This runs after SROA because promoting to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      LDS is of course less profitable than getting rid of the alloca or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      vectorizing it, thus we only want to do it when the only alternative is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      lowering the alloca to stack.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that both of them exist for the old and new PMs. The new PM passes are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// declared in AMDGPU.h and the legacy PM ones are declared here.s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A non-entry function has only 32 caller preserved registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not promote alloca which will force spilling unless we know the function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be inlined.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Use &#42;, 8&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">          1 + (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpupromotealloca-cpp-/#acf23f6c09a13fef96468852920609b77">LoopUserWeight</a> &#42; LI.getLoopDepth(Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Promotes a single user of the alloca to a vector form.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param Inst           Instruction to be promoted.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param DL             Module Data Layout.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param VectorTy       Vectorized Type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param VecStoreSize   Size of \\p VectorTy in bytes.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param GEPVectorIdx   GEP -&gt; VectorIdx cache.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param CurVal         Current value of the vector (e.g. last stored value)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param&#91;out&#93;  DeferredLoads \\p Inst is added to this vector if it can&#39;t</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="comment">///              CurVal, but \\p CurVal is nullptr.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return the stored value if \\p Inst would have written to the alloca, or</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Access as a vector type can work if the size of the access vector is a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    - VecTy = &lt;8 x float&gt;, AccessTy = &lt;4 x float&gt; -&gt; OK</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        - 3&#42;32 is not a multiple of 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We could handle more complicated cases, but it&#39;d make things a lot more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Iterates over an instruction worklist that may contain multiple instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690" lineLink="#ab31875cec1c2cfccd8e59abdbe931f77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ab31875cec1c2cfccd8e59abdbe931f77">forEachWorkListItem</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InstContainer &amp;WorkList,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">                                std::function&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;)&gt; Fn) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Bucket up uses of the alloca by the block they occur in.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is important because we have to handle multiple defs/uses in a block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ourselves: SSAUpdater is purely for cross-block references.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, SmallDenseSet&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a>&gt; UsesByBlock;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;BlockUses = UsesByBlock&#91;BB&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clamp to max value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><Highlight kind="normal">  OccupancyHint = std::min(OccupancyHint, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-mb/#ad70272e2a9ec2a7e3a497458e1edbc85aed0b9bef861c96eee19e89db753db7b2">ST</a>.getMaxWavesPerEU());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// usage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
